title: Suicide Note Claims: Dada KD’s son details exactly what happened in his dying moments
desc: Gyimah Peterson, son of late Highlife legend Dada KD, has firmly denied claims that his father left behind a suicide note before his death, insisting that he knows the true circumstances surrounding the incident.

title: equity rule for large property sales, says 'many ways' to execute deals
desc: The Employees Provident Fund (EPF) would have no difficulty in transacting in Malaysian real estate, its chief executive officer Ahmad Zulqarnain Onn said, in the face of a new requirement for government-linked companies and investment companies (GLCs and GLICs) to only dispose of properties valued at RM20 million and above to buyers with at least 50% Bumiputera ownership.

title: Chaos At Bengaluru Airport As Passengers Protest Nepal-Bound Air India Express Flight's Diversions
desc: Passengers protested at Bengaluru’s Kempegowda International Airport after repeated diversions disrupted their Kathmandu-bound flight, leaving them stranded for nearly two days.

title: 30-year jail term for Kilifi man who killed wife over Instagram dispute
desc: The High Court in Mombasa has sentenced a man to 30 years in prison for murdering his wife in Majengo Kanamai, Kilifi County. title: Nikola Jokic Goes Viral for Heated Reaction in Nuggets-Thunder
desc: Denver Nuggets star Nikola Jokic got heated on Friday night agains the OKC Thunder. His reaction went viral on social media.
